code: import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{combineActions,createAction,handleActions}from'redux-actions';const prefix='ENV';const setExt=createAction("".concat(prefix,"/SET_EXT"),ext=>{Cookies.set('ext',ext);return{ext};});const setUser=createAction("".concat(prefix,"/SET_USER"),user=>({user}));export const actions={setExt,setUser};const defaultState={ext:Cookies.get('ext')||'js',user:undefined};export default handleActions({[combineActions(setExt,setUser)]:(state,_ref)=>{let{payload}=_ref;return{...state,...payload};}},defaultState);
